title: 20 Min CALISTHENICS Workout with Beginner Variations | Follow Along
description:
Try this 20 minute follow along Calisthenics workout that you can do at home with no equipment. I have included scalable exercise options to suit different ability levels.

What is Calisthenics? Calisthenics is bodyweight training using gymnastic movements to develop strength, flexibility, balance and master control over your body. 

MEMBERS AREA/TPT STUDIO https://www.tompetotraining.com/members-area
SUBSCRIBE @TomPetoTraining 

UK AMAZON WOODEN PARALLETES - https://amzn.to/3scHCXf
USA AMAZON WOODEN PARALLETES - https://amzn.to/3lWrqbR

WARM UP
5 Inch Worm 
3/side Spider-Man Lunges
5/side Frog Squat Rocks
5/side Squat to Knee Drops
15r Tibialis Raises
Wrist Raises 15r
Wrist Circles 10/way

WORKOUT
2 sets
A1. 1 Down 2 Up Pistols 5/leg
A2. Pike Push-up 5r (Scaled Option: Negatives)

2 sets
B1. Reverse Nordics 5r
B2. Hollow Hold 30sec

2 sets
C1. Knee Tuck Push-Ups 5/side (Scaled Option: Kneeling)
C2. Hip Circles 10/way/leg

2 Sets
D1. Reverse Plank March 5/side (Scaled: Tabletop)
D2. Candle Raises 10r

STRETCH 30SEC EACH
-1/2 Kneeling Quad/Hip Flexor
-Hamstring & External Hip Rot

Disclaimer
To join in these exercises, you must be in good physical health. If you’ve been told for any health or medical reason that you should not take part in physical activity/sport, then you should not take part in this workout. When participating in any physical exercise, there is a possibility of physical injury. If you engage in these exercises, you agree that you do so at your own risk and assume all risk of injury to yourself.

*Affiliate links are included within this video description.

comments: I’ve been going to the gym for a long time but I’ve never done anything like this. The pistol squats are a killer.
Thanks for posting this. As a beginner, I was feeling a bit lost in the world of calisthenics, and I needed a good solid routine like this one to follow daily. You delivered, thank you.

I loved this workout! I've found a lot of other calisthenics workouts are just exhausting and impossible for me to get through, but this one is the right level of intensity that I can complete it but still feel challenged!

Stumbled over this in search of home-friendly body weight follow-along workouts. I really liked this, although it was horrible. Absolutely exhausting. I have a desk job and my goal is to feel stronger, more connected in my body and have more flexibility. This kind of workout is perfect, since I can do one before lunch and one in the evening. Saved to my workout playlist, thank you!
I did not think it will be so challenging, I'm adding it to may routine. Instructions that you gave were also great! Thank you for your hard work!
